categories.name: Atomics Fan
categories.label: Atomics Fan
categories.message: Here are the possible questions and answers for the Atomics Fan Possum exam.

questions.question: Atoms are assigned a number, called an 'atomic number'. Which of the following gives an atom its atomic number?
Be careful! You'll get sick if you handle radioactive elements for too long. Which of the following elements is NOT radioactive, and safe to handle as much as you want?
Boom! It's a nuclear explosion! Your friend Mack looks to you for help. What should you do next?
Critical mass is:
questions.answer: The minimum amount of material needed for a sustained nuclear chain reaction

questions.question: Elements have families, like you and me. Which of the following is NOT a family of elements on the periodic table?
Francium was discovered in what country?
In the theory of relativity, E=mc^2, what does the 'c' represent?
Johnny is a is trying to make his own Fusion Core at home. What will he need to make one?
Little atoms are made up of a few essential parts. Which of the following is NOT part of an atom?
Protons, neutrons, and electrons are all examples of what?
Some materials (especially nuclear ones) can be unstable, and are dangerous to work with. Which of the following is an example of an unstable material?
The T-51b Power Armor uses what device as a power supply?
The subatomic particle with the same mass as an electron but with a positive charge is known as what?
The year is 2066. An ever-growing energy crisis is threatening to destabilize the United States. What device did our dashing scientists introduce as a potential solution?
Though tiny, atoms do have mass. Where is most of it found?
Uranium oxide concentrate is also known as what?
What are some of the risks involved with atomic energy and nuclear power?
What is the proper pronunciation of 'Nuclear'?
You may not think it, but the sun runs on a nuclear reaction, just like our cars and toys! Which nuclear reaction makes the sun shine?
Your best friend Timmy leads you to a discovery he made out by the old swimming hole with barrels of nuclear waste! What should you do?
questions.answer: Leave immediately and find an adult

categories.name: Archaeologist
categories.label: Archaeologist
categories.message: Here are the possible questions and answers for the Archaeologist Possum exam.

questions.question: Alfonso took a trip to Europe and saw the ruins of Pompeii. He learned that a famous volcano erupted, and buried the city in ash. Which volcano?
Brendan went to a museum exhibit in Europe and saw a very famous rock. He says it was used to decipher ancient Egyptian hieroglyphics! What rock is he referring to?
Hannah wants to hunt for lost tombs. She'll need to be careful of what kind of traps?
Samuel is an archaeologist working at Chichen Itza. What ancient people would he be studying?
Some of our best finds come from tombs built by the ancient Egyptians. What are these tombs called?
You're excavating an ancient Egyptian tomb and find a large stone box with a body inside! What do you call this box?
You're helping dig through an ancient Egyptian tomb and find a large stone box. It probably contains a mummy, but what is the name of the large stone box itself?
You've discovered an artifact during an excavation. Which of the following should NOT be recorded?
Archaeology does NOT include which of the following?
Susie loves to explore ancient ruins. What should she do to protect a site she's working on?
questions.answer: Document and leave finds in place

questions.question: Which of these famous historical sites is in England?
You're exploring a cave and find an old, dusty skeleton! It's holding a book with the title 'The Histories' by a man named Herodotus. What is Herodotus known as?
You're helping excavate a site in Egypt when you find an old, dusty book written by a Greek fellow named Herodotus. What was his nickname?
You're working on a big dig with lots of artifacts to keep track of. What's a good way to catalog and keep track of them?
Your professor wants you to take notes on a new find, but you don't know what kind of artifact it is yet! Which of the following would be a useful piece of information to include in your notes?
You're excavating a dig site in Egypt and uncover an artifact shaped like a bug. What kind of insect is it shaped like that was sacred to ancient Egyptians?
You find an ancient, dusty scroll written in an ancient language. What do you call the study of ancient writing systems?
What is the name of the scientific study of human activity through the things they leave behind?
What was the name of the first man-made satellite to orbit Earth?
You're exploring a ruin when you find an old bronze statue. How can you figure out how old it is?

categories.name: Backpacker
categories.label: Backpacker
categories.message: Here are the possible questions and answers for the Backpacker Possum exam.

questions.question: A backpacker is in the middle of a long journey and is starting to get a little stinky. What can they use to freshen up?
Backpacking can be a great way to take in the great outdoors, but it can be a bit daunting for a new adventurer. What's one of the first things you should do to prepare for a backpacking trip?
Hannah is packing for a backpacking trip. Which of these things should she leave behind?
If you're going backpacking, you'll probably sleep in a tent. What's a good way to keep your tent safe from the elements?
It's important to take care of the environment when you're backpacking. Which of these practices will help you Leave No Trace?
Johnny is a backpacker and loves to take in the great outdoors! Unfortunately, he forgot his compass at home and has wandered off the trail. What can he use to help find his way?
Samuel is out backpacking in the woods when he comes across a mama bear and her cub! What's the best course of action?
Susie is planning a big backpacking trip, and needs to bring something to help start a fire in the wild. Which of these would be a good choice?
What is the best way to stay warm while backpacking in the wilderness?
When you're backpacking, you'll need some food to keep you going. Which of these foods would be a good choice for a long hike?
When you're out backpacking, it's important to stay hydrated! What's a good way to make sure your water is safe to drink?
Which of these animals is most likely to carry rabies, which could be a big problem for a backpacker?
Which of these is a good way to find north without a compass while backpacking?
While backpacking, Hannah finds a cool-looking rock she wants to keep as a souvenir. What's the best way to handle it?
While backpacking, you find a beautiful meadow you'd like to camp in. What's one thing you should check for before setting up camp?
You find a nice, secluded spot to camp while backpacking. What's one thing you should do to make sure you're safe from wildlife?
questions.answer: Hang your food in a tree

questions.question: You're backpacking through the woods when you realize you're running low on water. What's a good source of water you might find nearby?
You're going backpacking in the mountains! Which of these shoes would be the best choice for the trail?
You're planning a backpacking trip and need to pack light. Which of these items is probably NOT necessary?
You're setting up camp while backpacking and need to start a fire. What's one thing you should make sure to do?

categories.name: Chemist
categories.label: Chemist
categories.message: Here are the possible questions and answers for the Chemist Possum exam.

questions.question: Franklin just splashed his eyes with an unknown chemical while working at his chemistry station. What should he do right away?
questions.answer: Find the nearest eye wash station and begin flushing his eyes for 15 minutes

questions.question: In a pinch, what two components can you use to create gunpowder?
It's important to know the key components of important chems in the event of an emergency. Antiseptic, blood, and steel are all combined to make which chem?
Richard is an amateur metalworker, and works with ore at his chemistry station, in addition to chemicals. Which chemical might Richard have that would be useful for working with ore?
Safety first! While working in the lab, horseplay is...
Safety is of the utmost importance to a good chemist. When working at a chemistry station, make sure you always wear which of the following?
Some materials (especially nuclear ones) can be unstable, and are dangerous to work with. Which of the following is an example of an unstable material?
Wesley is about to start working with nuclear materials. He can take a chem to reduce the effects of radiation while he works. Which chem should he take before handling the materials?
What are the only known side effects of Radaway, for instance?
You can't always expect to have the right amount chems at the right time. In the event of an emergency, Stimpaks, Radaway, and Rad-X can be diluted with what?
Your best friend, Chris, has been going to the gym a lot lately and has become addicted to Buffout. What can you give him to wean him off this horrible drug?
A chemist knows that alcohol is a solution! What does that mean?
questions.answer: It's a mixture where one substance is dissolved in another

questions.question: Chemicals can be hazardous, so you need to know how to handle them safely. What's one thing you should always do when working with chemicals?
Hannah is working with some volatile chemicals and needs to cool them down to keep them stable. What's a good way to do that?
Samuel is mixing two chemicals together and smells a sharp, pungent odor. What should he do?
Susie is trying to identify a chemical compound. What's one way she can figure out what it is?
What is the primary source of energy for Earth's climate system?
Which of these is a common chemical used to purify water?
You need to mix a chemical solution, but you don't have a stir rod. What's a good alternative?
You're working with a chemical that could cause burns. What's the first thing you should do if it gets on your skin?
questions.answer: Rinse with water for at least 15 minutes

categories.name: Collector

questions.question: Alfonso collects miniature bobbleheads. What's a good way to display them?
questions.answer: On a shelf with good lighting

questions.question: Hannah is an avid stamp collector. What's one thing she should do to preserve her collection?
questions.answer: Store them in a dry, cool place

questions.question: If you're collecting rare books, what's one thing you should avoid doing to keep them in good condition?
Johnny collects comic books. What's a good way to protect them from damage?
Samuel collects old coins. What's one thing he should avoid to keep them in good condition?
Susie is starting a collection of antique teacups. What's one thing she should check before buying one?
What is a common way to organize a coin collection?
You find a rare baseball card! What's one thing you should do to keep it safe?
questions.answer: Put it in a protective sleeve

questions.question: You're collecting vinyl records. What's one thing you should avoid to keep them in good condition?
You're starting a collection of vintage toys. What's one thing you should do to verify their authenticity?
Your friend wants to start collecting bottle caps. What's a good way to store them?
A collector needs to keep track of their items. What's a good way to do that?
Hannah is collecting rare butterflies. What's one thing she should do to preserve them?
questions.answer: Mount them in a display case

questions.question: Samuel is collecting old maps. What's one thing he should avoid doing to them?
Susie is collecting antique jewelry. What's one thing she should do to clean it safely?
questions.answer: Use a soft cloth and mild soap

questions.question: What is one reason collectors might focus on a specific type of item, like stamps or coins?
You're collecting old postcards. What's one thing you should do to protect them?
You're showing off your collection at a show. What's one thing you should do to keep it safe?
questions.answer: Keep it in a locked display case

questions.question: Your collection of rare coins is getting big! What's a good way to insure it against loss or damage?
You're trading a collectible with another collector. What's one thing you should do to make sure it's a fair trade?
